<!-- rnb-source-begin  -->

```r
metabolonPCoAMeta %>%
  group_by(virus.bin) %>%
  summarise(virus.Dim1 = mean(Dim1),
            virus.Dim2 = mean(Dim2)) -> metabolonCentroid

ggplot(metabolonPCoAMeta,
       aes(x = Dim1,
           y = Dim2,
           color = virus.bin)) +
  geom_point(size = 2,
             alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_color_manual(name = \Respiratory viral\ninfection status\"
